mapper.insert: insert into t_video(vno,vuploadpath,vfilename, regdate,story,cno) values( SEQ_T_VIDEO.nextval,#{vuploadpath},#{vfilename},#{ regdate},#{story},#{cno})
mapper.select: select * from t_video where cno= #{cno} ORDER BY VNO DESC

select attachNo, uuid, uploadPath, fileName, fileType, uploadPath || uuid ||'_' || fileName as savePath, uploadPath ||'s_' || uuid ||'_' || fileName as s_savePath from tbl_attach where attachno= #{attachno}
SELECT * FROM T_CONTENTS ORDER BY CNO DESC

choose.when:
select *from ( select ROW_NUMBER()
over(order by rating asc)
row_num,c.* from t_contents c )
WHERE
tags like '%' ||#{tags} ||'%'
or where
genre like '%' ||#{genre} ||'%'
choose.otherwise:
SELECT * FROM T_CONTENTS
WHERE
tags like '%' ||#{tags} ||'%'
or where
genre like '%' ||#{genre} ||'%'
ORDER BY CNO DESC
ORDER BY SHOWDATE DESC
ORDER BY CNAME

mapper.update: update t_contents set puploadpath = #{puploadpath}, pfilename = #{pfilename} where cname = #{cname}
mapper.delete: delete tbl_attach where attachno= #{attachno} and uuid = #{uuid}

choose.when: select cno, cname,pfilename,agelimit from t_contents where rec is not null order by cno desc
choose.otherwise:
select row_num,cno,cname,pfilename,agelimit from ( select ROW_NUMBER()
over(order by cno desc)
over(order by rating asc)
row_num,cno,cname,pfilename,agelimit from t_contents )where rownum BETWEEN 1 and 5
